attributes.action: Harehills needs sport centre so kids can keep them self occupied in activities.
attributes.background: Recently the crime figures have gone up and there was two murders beginning of 2017 where a teenager was shot and another was stabbed we often see young kids hanging on corners getting in to mischievous things which sometime lead to tragedies. Simply because there is very little for them to do.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is the responsibility of Leeds City Council, not the UK Government or Parliament. You could raise your issue with a local councillor, who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillor
